## SimpleJsonMap.createSimple() method

Creates a new [SimpleJsonMap](./ts-json.simplejsonmap.md) from the supplied objects

**Signature:**

```typescript
static createSimple(values?: MapOrRecord<JsonValue>, context?: IJsonContext, options?: ISimpleJsonMapOptions): Result<SimpleJsonMap>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  values | MapOrRecord&lt;JsonValue&gt; | _(Optional)_ A string-keyed <code>Map</code> or <code>Record</code> of the  to be returned. |

|  options | ISimpleJsonMapOptions | _(Optional)_ Optional  for initialization. |

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[SimpleJsonMap](./ts-json.simplejsonmap.md)<!-- -->&gt;
